net.floodlightcontroller.core.module

Annotation Type Run


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Run
    Indicate the run() method of a floodlight module
    Author:
    readams

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean mainLoop
      declares this run method as the application main method.

    • Element Detail

      • mainLoop

        public abstract boolean mainLoop
        declares this run method as the application main method. Will be called last and is not expected to return. It is a configuration error to have more than one module declaring a main method.
        Returns:
        Default:
        false
